description: gofix: add -debug flag for quicker diagnosis of internal errors

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

PTAL.

Better?
- gri

On Wed, Jan 25, 2012 at 10:51 AM,  <r@golang.org> wrote:
> i'd rather not add flags like this,, but i admit i don't understand the
> problem you're trying to solve. gofix already shows incorrectly
> formatted output when testing.
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5564055/

LGTM

I think this is useful, especially as a const
that can be toggled while working on gofix.

Russ
i'd rather not add flags like this,, but i admit i don't understand the problem you're trying to solve. gofix already shows incorrectly formatted output when testing.
i still don't understand the point

gofix fails on occasion with syntax errors because go/printer screws
up (to be fixed). When it screws up, it's good to see the source code
causing the problem as it usually makes it clear(er) what the actual
issue is (the error messages w/o source code are not very indicative).
-debug is just a tool oto help diagnose those cases more quickly.

I will just revert this.
- gri

On Wed, Jan 25, 2012 at 11:16 AM,  <r@golang.org> wrote:
> i still don't understand the point
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5564055/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0815aec660e5 ***

gofix: add -debug flag for quicker diagnosis of internal errors
